projects.title: Flickr-like Parallax Scrolling
projects.desc: Parallax scrolling like the Flickr home page

projects.title: Three Bean Parallax
projects.desc: Parallax scrolling with fore-, mid- and background images

projects.title: Marching Diagonal Lines
projects.desc: Hover effect with animated diagonal lines in the background

projects.title: Masked Thumbnails
projects.desc: Thumbnails with png shape masks that enlarge when hovered. The non-hovered thumbnails fade out slightly.

projects.title: Masked Thumbnails 2
projects.desc: On the same project as Masked Thumbnails, the non-hovered thumbnails fade out slightly.

projects.title: Hover Fade Swap
projects.desc: Swapping images with a fade effect on hover

projects.title: Simple Project Tracker V1
projects.desc: Reads project data from a json file of daily projects and displays a simple calendar checking off days toward 100 days of small front end projects.
